


const int bitonic_ASCENDING_block = 1;
int lo_inputs[100] = {26,22,31,20,26,3,26,30,13,5,31,29,29,8,29,0,1,16,12,26,23,26,20,13,18,1,3,30,6,13,20,20,28,6,12,12,25,23,31,30,4,9,27,30,21,12,21,29,30,11,22,10,24,15,26,15,21,5,23,21,1,16,17,25,9,12,24,25,30,9,30,12,25,19,8,30,24,23,1,22,3,25,8,14,1,11,4,20,29,19,0,21,28,17,6,1,6,0,23,12};;
int k_inputs[100] = {20,24,5,28,27,3,23,15,10,15,24,3,1,30,13,27,4,1,7,20,23,23,5,4,10,8,8,21,32,19,5,13,3,9,3,5,1,23,18,5,26,25,19,28,10,17,32,16,8,25,32,5,30,9,28,14,32,8,1,17,2,13,21,17,22,27,5,12,5,9,12,20,25,13,27,32,13,23,29,12,27,8,30,7,28,9,26,27,6,24,26,11,27,27,3,16,0,9,26,20};;
const int bitonic_DESCENDING_block = 0;
